message.search: SELECT ms.message, ms.type FROM message ms JOIN keyword key ON ms.id = key.message_id WHERE '{0}' LIKE '%' || key.keyword || '%';

Schedule.messageList: SELECT key.keyword, ms.message, ms.type FROM message ms JOIN keyword key ON ms.id = key.message_id WHERE {0} = ms.type;

sql.channels: SELECT channel_id, name, reviewer_flg FROM channels;

user.insert: INSERT INTO account(account_id, name, reviewer_flg, access_count) VALUES ('{0}', '{1}', false, 1);

channel.insert: INSERT INTO channel(channel_id, name, reviewer_flg) VALUES ('{0}', '{1}', false);

composition.search: SELECT * FROM channel_composition WHERE '{0}' = account_id AND '{1}' = channel_id;
composition.insert: INSERT INTO channel_composition(id, account_id, channel_id) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), '{0}', '{1}');
